Allen Iverson had 26 points, nine assists, and combined with Linas Kleiza , JR Smith and Eduardo Nájera on a 14-1 fourth-quarter spurt that carried the Nuggets to a 125-114 victory over the New Jersey Nets on Friday night. We've been struggling, losing two on the road and we just wanted to do anything to get a win, Allen Iverson said after scoring 21 second-half points to help the Nuggets break a two-game losing streak. The Nuggets needed every one of those points after blowing a 17-point third-quarter lead and eventually falling behind by two. "Welcome

"We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time," Eric Schmidt said in a statement released by Google. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come. Internally, Eric Schmidt will continue to act as an adviser to Larry Page and Google co-founder Sergey Brin , who will also focus on strategic projects and new products. DALLAS-- The Mayor Tom of Dallas says he did not sanction giving Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Michael Vick a key to the city. Michael Vick won The Associated Press Comeback Player of the Year award this past season, his second in the NFL since serving 18 months in prison for operating a dogfighting operation.
